resources.string: Book your meeting by providing participants, length of the meeting, meeting room and purpose"
How many hours will the meeting last?
Which meeting room you will use?
What is the purpose of the meeting?
This is a simple meeting scheduling app. You can check user meetings, create a new meeting, which can be added to device calendar
NOTE: when you are done, click the Done Button before you try to add new meeting or check another user meetings!
Whose meetings you would like see?
